title: The Glow of Morning
description: Take a wickedly sensuous peek into the erotic relationship between Jason and Ann, lovers comfortable in their own skins who delight in each other’s bodies and desires. When she wakes up in Jason’s arms after a tantalizing dream, Ann finds that she isn’t the only one in an amorous mood. The day’s agenda will have to wait as the couple starts their morning with languid lovemaking and an intimate shower.
author: A.N. Heron
